query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, m.organization_id, m.role, m.status, o.name as org_name, o.slug
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN memberships m ON u.id = m.user_id
LEFT JOIN organizations o ON m.organization_id = o.id
WHERE u.email = 'mariomicrotel@gmail.com';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user wjjXWQDGjB7WrTn.ac8865d956e8 --database 3e8SkZx3sJxzLsSkfWugGu --execute SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, m.organization_id, m.role, m.status, o.name as org_name, o.slug
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN memberships m ON u.id = m.user_id
LEFT JOIN organizations o ON m.organization_id = o.id
WHERE u.email = 'mariomicrotel@gmail.com';
